text: The 1968 Richmond upon Thames Council election took place on 9 May 1968 to elect members of Richmond upon Thames London Borough Council in London, England. The whole council was up for election and the Conservative party stayed in overall control of the council. ==Background== ==Election result== {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center;" |colspan=2|Party |colspan=3|Votes |colspan=3|Seats |- |Conservative Party | style="background:"| |31,769 (59.24%) | | 11.44 |54 (100.0%) | | 13 |- |Labour Party | style="background:"| |10,758 (20.06%) | | 10.83 |0 (0.0%) | | 12 |- |Liberal Party | style="background:"| |9,697 (18.08%) | | 0.06 | 0 (0.0%) | | 0 |- |Residents Association | style="background:"| |1,162 (2.17%) | | N/A | 0 (0.0%) | | N/A |- |Communist Party | style="background:"| |133 (0.25%) | | 0.60 | 0 (0.0%) | | 0 |- |Independent | style="background:"| |113 (0.21%) | | 2.24 | 0 (0.0%) | | 1 |} {| style="width:88%; text-align:center;" |+ ↓ |- style="color:white;" | style="background:; width:100.0%;" | 54 |- | |} ==Ward results== ==References== 1968 Category:1968 London Borough council elections
title: 1968 Richmond upon Thames London Borough Council election
